name: Video Translator
description: Download videos from any URL and extract audio for translation purposes.

download_video.description: Download a video from a URL for translation processing.

video_url.description: The URL of the video to download (YouTube, Twitch, etc.).

quality.description: The video quality to download (optional, defaults to 'best').

extract_audio.description: Extract audio from a downloaded video file for translation processing.

translate_transcription.description: Translate a transcription file from one language to another using OpenRouter and LLM.

merge_audio.description: Replace the original video audio with the dubbed audio to create a translated video.

get_speakers_references.description: Extract speaker reference audio clips from the transcribed audio for voice cloning purposes.

detect_genders.description: Detect the gender of each speaker from the audio file for personalized translation.

create_new_audio.description: Generate new dubbed audio segments using Chatterbox ONNX with speaker voice cloning and intelligent grouping.
